key:
(B) 
Sol.
 
Solution of economic load dispatch is the most relevant information needed to specify the real power 
P
 
at 
PV
 buses in load flow analysis. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).

 In second cycle it will charge from 0.1 A to 0.4 A, (charge by 0.3 A and discharge by 0.2 A) and 
discharge to 0.2A from 0.4 A. 
 

 After each cycle inductor current increases by 0.1 A from the value of its previous cycle.

question_text:
Question 24 
 
Out of the following options, the most relevant information needed to specify the real power (
P
) at the PV 
buses in a load flow analysis is. 
 
 
(A) base power of the generator 
(B) solution of economic load dispatch. 
 
(C) rated power output of the generator 
(D) rated voltage of the generator.

GATE 2020 
 [Forenoon Session]
 
Electrical Engineering
PAGE
26
answer_text:
(B) 
Sol.
 
Solution of economic load dispatch is the most relevant information needed to specify the real power 
P
 
at 
PV
 buses in load flow analysis. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).
